item.description:
Looks like another great night to fly. For those of you that flew with us to LCI last week know what a nice flight that was with 5 planes and 13 pilot/co-pilots.  So here's the plan, how about we fly out to New Bedford (KEWB) 63.6NM and have dinner at the Airport Grille located in the terminal. This is a fine restaurant with excellent food, even by non-airport standards. It's obviously already a very popular stop for pilots from all over the Northeast.  Check the daily specials for seafood dishes and any other favorites you may have.  This is an FCA favorite and this will be our 4th visit since the new resturant opened.  Wheels up at 6:00 and remember to check with the briefer for possible TFRS.

 

Hope to see you there.

Gary

http://www.airportgrille.com

http://www.airnav.comkewb

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: New Bedford Fly Out and Dinner at the Airport Grille
